mapper.select:
select
, ,o.id as orgid,o.name as orgname from ecuser t left join user_org_job uoj on t.account_id=uoj.user_id left join organization o on uoj.org_id=o.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
, ,o.id as orgid,o.name as orgname from ecuser t left join user_org_job uoj on t.account_id=uoj.user_id left join organization o on uoj.org_id=o.id where t.account_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
